Content.Text:
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did I surprise you?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been cleaning and cooking to thank
you for everything you always do for me!
Can you tell me first next time?
I'm so happy!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
S-Sorry! I just wanted to surprise you.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It isn't your fault, <MYNAME>. I just went
ahead and did this without permission.
I'm really sorry.
<PAGE>
Don't tell me you've had enough of me?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Phew! That's a relief.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for seeing me home. I'll thank
you next time I see you.
<PAGE>
Don't worry, it won't be a surprise!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>. Goodnight.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh dear. I really messed up this time.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Heh heh!<RED>∀</RED> It was worth all the hard
work!
<PAGE>
Are you hungry? We should eat
together!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Go ahead, dig in!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ugh, I'm sorry. I think I've messed all
of this cooking up.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I do like to eat but I'm still not that
good at cooking myself. It tasted better
when I was practicing.
You'll do better next time
Shall we try cooking together?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't worry, I will!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Once I get a little better, <MYNAME>,
maybe you'll... you know...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
P-P-Pro... prop... propo...!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Forget I tried to say anything. Let's
eat the rest of this, shall we?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for seeing me home. I'll have
another shot at the cooking soon.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll see you soon, <MYNAME>. Goodnight.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You'd do that for me? I know I'll make
progress if you help me, <MYNAME>, because
you cook so well!
<PAGE>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. I'm so
happy!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for seeing me home. Let's cook
something together soon, then!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so jealous of your skill in the
kitchen, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Once we're living together I think we'll
be able to enjoy delicious meals every
single day!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? What is it, <MYNAME>? Did I say
something to upset you?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's okay then.
<PAGE>
Well, <MYNAME>. Goodnight.
